quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope. – Martin Luther King, Jr.
fact: The Pentagon, in Arlington, Virginia, has twice as many bathrooms as is necessary, because when it was built in the 1940s, the state of Virginia still had segregation laws requiring separate toilet facilities for blacks and whites.
joke: What do you call a boy who stopped digging holes? Douglas.
